name: Battle Aquarina
description:
Get your opponent off the ramp^^ Boom!

P1

.......................................................................................

Rapid Tap Up (W) to balance Left

Rapid Tap Down (S) to balance Right

A/D to move Left and Right

Button1 aka R = Attack Left

Button 2 aka T = Attack Right

Down +Back = Block

........................................................................................

P2

.......................................................................................

Rapid Tap Up (U) to balance Left

Rapid Tap Down (J) to balance Right

H/J to move Left and Right

Button1 aka O = Attack Left

Button 2 aka P = Attack Right

Down + Right = Block

For PC exe press K for keyboard J for joypad

The game should play ok on mobile.
